markdownRemark.html:
Choose a New York Times article and select a few sentences or a paragraph to represent its story. Then make three ‘different’ compositions for mobile (375 × 812px), desktop (1440 × 900px), and print (8.5 × 11 in). The compositions must use only type in black and white (no images or graphic shapes).

Use Figma for the screen, and Indesign for the print. In the end of the class, you will share how you used typesetting principles and grid system for each composition.
